content: All these good arguments read invalid if the notification functionality of Facebook does not stop spamming people with events that do not fit in one of the common definitions of the term “notification”. I wish she could do something that backs up her popularity. Spamming the notification timeline will only bring more notification access privilege turndowns than app opens. Bad designs, even if supported by monopoly, cannot withstand the people’s wrath forever. Be changing, or be doomed.
